Questionnaire item keys

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
qstnr_item_keys.Rd

A tibble of item keys supported in the raw FOKUS questionnaire data.

Format

A tibble.

See also

Other FOKUS metadata: all_argument_sides, all_ballot_dates, all_ballot_types, all_cantons, all_election_seat_types, all_langs, all_lvls, all_main_motive_types, all_name_types, all_postal_dispatch_types, all_postal_dispatch_ways, all_prcds, all_proposal_types, all_qstn_groups, all_response_option_types

Examples

fokus:::qstnr_item_keys
#> # A tibble: 23 × 9
